00025 var DOMSpanElement      = nil,
00026     DOMIFrameElement    = nil,
00027     DefaultFont         = nil;
00028 
00029 @implementation CPPlatformString : CPBasePlatformString
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00033 + (void)bootstrap
00034 {
00035     [self createDOMElements];
00036 }
00037 
00038 + (void)createDOMElements
00039 {
00040     DOMIFrameElement = document.createElement("iframe");
00041     // necessary for Safari caching bug:
00042     DOMIFrameElement.name = "iframe_" + FLOOR(RAND() * 10000);
00043     DOMIFrameElement.style.position = "absolute";
00044     DOMIFrameElement.style.left = "-100px";
00045     DOMIFrameElement.style.top = "-100px";
00046     DOMIFrameElement.style.width = "1px";
00047     DOMIFrameElement.style.height = "1px";
00048     DOMIFrameElement.style.borderWidth = "0px";
00049     DOMIFrameElement.style.overflow = "hidden";
00050     DOMIFrameElement.style.zIndex = 100000000000;
00051     DOMIFrameElement.className = "cpdontremove";
00052 
00053     var bodyElement = [CPPlatform mainBodyElement];
00054 
00055     bodyElement.appendChild(DOMIFrameElement);
00056 
00057     var DOMIFrameDocument = (DOMIFrameElement.contentDocument || DOMIFrameElement.contentWindow.document);
00058     DOMIFrameDocument.write("<html><head></head><body></body></html>");
00059     DOMIFrameDocument.close();
00060 
00061     // IE needs this wide <div> to prevent unwanted text wrapping:
00062     var DOMDivElement = DOMIFrameDocument.createElement("div");
00063     DOMDivElement.style.position = "absolute";
00064     DOMDivElement.style.width = "100000px";
00065 
00066     DOMIFrameDocument.body.appendChild(DOMDivElement);
00067 
00068     DOMSpanElement = DOMIFrameDocument.createElement("span");
00069     DOMSpanElement.style.position = "absolute";
00070     DOMSpanElement.style.whiteSpace = "pre";
00071     DOMSpanElement.style.visibility = "visible";
00072     DOMSpanElement.style.padding = "0px";
00073     DOMSpanElement.style.margin = "0px";
00074 
00075     DOMDivElement.appendChild(DOMSpanElement);
00076 }
00077 
00078 + (CGSize)sizeOfString:(CPString)aString withFont:(CPFont)aFont forWidth:(float)aWidth
00079 {
00080     if (!aFont)
00081     {
00082         if (!DefaultFont)
00083             DefaultFont = [CPFont systemFontOfSize:12.0];
00084 
00085         aFont = DefaultFont;
00086     }
00087 
00088     var style = DOMSpanElement.style;
00089 
00090     if (!aWidth)
00091     {
00092         style.width = "";
00093         style.whiteSpace = "pre";
00094     }
00095     else
00096     {
00097         style.width = ROUND(aWidth) + "px";
00098         style.wordWrap = "break-word";
00099         style.whiteSpace = "-o-pre-wrap";
00100         style.whiteSpace = "-pre-wrap";
00101         style.whiteSpace = "-moz-pre-wrap";
00102         style.whiteSpace = "pre-wrap";
00103     }
00104 
00105     style.font = [aFont cssString];
00106 
00107     if (CPFeatureIsCompatible(CPJavascriptInnerTextFeature))
00108         DOMSpanElement.innerText = aString;
00109     else if (CPFeatureIsCompatible(CPJavascriptTextContentFeature))
00110         DOMSpanElement.textContent = aString;
00111 
00112     return _CGSizeMake(DOMSpanElement.clientWidth, DOMSpanElement.clientHeight);
00113 }
